bug.author: aschernov
bug.summary: CVAT new UI: a bug with polygon's interpolation
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>My actions before raising this issue</denchmark-h>
Read/searched the docs Searched past issues
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected Behaviour</denchmark-h>
The points of the previous polygon mustn't appear while polygon's interpolation. The arrow must keep the initial direction during all the frames ( key & non-key) <denchmark-h:h3>Current Behaviour</denchmark-h>
Noticed if press CTRL after using shift +N to draw a polygon in interpolation mode, we can see the points of previous polygon: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45849884/87147402-40c8ec00-c2b5-11ea-944e-4714038f82c8.gif></denchmark-link>
Also the arrow changes its direction on non-key frames: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45849884/87148303-d618b000-c2b6-11ea-9c13-fa171b2f8726.gif></denchmark-link>
